New Records: Rodrygo scored the winning goal for Brazil against Ecuador in the World Cup Qualifying match.
Brazil moved up to fourth place in the standings after the victory.
Key Match Events: Rodrygo's goal was the decisive moment of the match.
Alisson Becker made a crucial save to deny Ecuador a potential equalizer.
Post-Match Reflections: Dorival Junior praised the defensive performance but noted the midfield's struggles.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was crucial for Brazil's World Cup qualification efforts.
The game saw a high-stakes confrontation between Rodrygo and Ecuador's defense.
